screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() # y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 120, textsize[1] + 120) offset = 45 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 105 wsizex = textsize[0] + 180 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (1200 > wsizex): wsizex = 1200 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 30, 96) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(15, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: QuickSubtitlesConfigMenu
screen.title: Subtitle settings
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize wsizex = 1920 wsizey = 1080 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
